tossup_question: 12) PHYSICS  Which of the following statements is correct about the value of acceleration due to gravity (g) in a light and heavy falling body?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) the value of g will be greater in the light body
X) the value of g will be greater in the heavy body
Y) ) the value of g will be equal
Z) None of the Above
tossup_answer: ANSWER: Y) the value of g will be equal
bonus_question: 12) PHYSICS  Ahmed throws a ball vertically in the air with an initial velocity of 5m/s. What is the maximum height of the ball? Assume gravity = 10m/s
